1. åŸºç¡€ï¼šæœ€ç®€å•çš„ select

result.scalars().all()  ->  list[User]

2. åªæŸ¥è¯¢éƒ¨åˆ†å­—æ®µ

3.1 ç­‰äº

    User.age > 18,
    User.status == 1

3.3 OR æ¡ä»¶ 

from sqlalchemy import or_

stmt = select(User).where(
    or_(User.age < 18, User.status == 0)

3.4 IN

3.5 LIKE

4. æ’åº ORDER BY
